      void testQuestion6()
      Test Question 5: renderUp
      register refNumber R12345
      [expected value] refNumber -> "R12345"
      [expected value] borrowed -> false
      [expected value] countOfBorrowing -> 0
      borrow
      [expected value] refNumber -> "R12345"
      [expected value] borrowed -> true
      [expected value] countOfBorrowing -> 1
      renderUp
      [expected value] borrowed -> false
      [expected value] countOfBorrowing -> 1
      borrow
      [expected value] borrowed -> true
      [expected value] countOfBorrowing -> 2
      // new book
      register refNumber R1234676
      [expected value] registered -> true
      [expected value] refNumber -> "R1234676"
      [expected value] borrowed -> false
      [expected value] countOfBorrowing -> 0
      borrow
      [expected value] borrowed -> true
      [expected value] countOfBorrowing -> 1
